name: UIPasteboard.DetectionPattern
desc: An object that represents a pattern to detect on the pasteboard, such as a URL, text, or number.

items.name: static let number: UIPasteboard.DetectionPattern
items.desc: A pattern that indicates the pasteboard contains a string that consists of a numeric value.

items.name: static let probableWebSearch: UIPasteboard.DetectionPattern
items.desc: A pattern that indicates the pasteboard contains a string suitable for use as a web search term.

items.name: static let probableWebURL: UIPasteboard.DetectionPattern
items.desc: A pattern that indicates the pasteboard contains a string that consists of a URL.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a detection pattern to detect different types of content on the pasteboard.
